title: Burning Ascension
description: At the end of Incineration, the first book in the Incineration Series, Phee was left flayed open. She might lose her love, her friends, and their safety.Life only gets harder for her with each new discovery that unveils a conspiracy involving the survivors of the Avian Rodentia Virus—and Phee is at the center. Her parents’ disappearance and the unpopulated world are not as simple as she once thought. Needing answers, Emory and Phee travel to follow a group of outsiders. While Emory wants revenge, Phee is determined to rescue Hudson, a six-year-old boy she left behind in New York.During their journey, they discover the impossible and fight to determine Phee’s role. The lives of everyone at the compound are at stake. A loved one’s ultimate betrayal opens her up to new levels of pain that might just break her; and Emory’s and Phee’s faith in each other wavers, threatening to destroy more than their hearts.With new friends Drew, Lacy, and Travis; Emory and Phee try to reveal the hidden secrets and save the survivors at the compound from impending death. Not an easy task when they might not be able to save themselves.Can Phee rise from the embers left behind by new disasters?Is there enough of Phee left to save Hudson and everyone she loves?
author: Annie Streger
